title: Neeyum Ada Naanum Lyrics Vil Ambu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:Neeyum Ada Naanum - Vil Ambu,
Movie:Vil Ambu,
Singer:D Imman,
Singer:AV Pooja,

Ennaachu ennamo aachu
Yenaku puriyalaye edhvum
Thala keezha kavuthutta saachu
Unaku theriyudha adhuvum
Nenachu paakula siricha paakula
Valichi potta un kanaala

Paartha nodiyula potta pidiyula
Maatha mudiyila ennaala
Hey neeyum adi naanum onna serndha
Vera edhuvum enaku venaa
Adhu podhum adhu podhum
Neeyum ada naanum onna serndha
Manam sirakadikumey
Edhuvum venaa enaku adhu podhum

Paathathum illa
Padithathum illa
Pazhakamum illa
Kadhal pudhusu enaku puriyadhey
Arivayum vena vena
Anubavam vena
Adhu varum thaana

Adhuku varambu muraye kidayadhu
Aambala manasule aani dhan adikure
Angadhan padamena thongidhan sirikure
Nasungama manankasangaama enna maatitey

Hey neeyum adi naanum onna serndha
Vera edhuvum enaku venaa
Adhu podhum adhu podhum
Neeyum ada naanum onna serndha
Manam sirakadikum
Edhuvum venaa enaku adhu podhum

Vazhiyula marichu
Vizhiyula sirichu
Valaiyathaan virichi pudicha
Neeyum enna vasamaathaan
Manasula nuzhainchu
Nenapula nenanchu
Moochula kalandhu olinja
Neeyum ulla usuraathaan

Kandhalaa irundha en vaazhkaya maathuney
Kandadhum pudichidhu Kaadhala kaatuney
Adichaalum pudichaalum enaku nee venum

Neeyum ada naanum onna serndha
Ver edhuvum enaku venaa
Adhu podhum adhu podhum

Neeyum adi naanum onna serndha
Manam sirakadikum
Vera edhuvum vena enaku
Adhu podhumÂ
